price: 15. Boye oyo mpe ezali kindoki to bozali kornona malamu te?
arabic: أَفَسِحۡرٌ هَٰذَآ أَمۡ أَنتُمۡ لَا تُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: afasiḥ'run hādhā am antum lā tub'ṣirūna
